com.viaoa.web

Class OAServletImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.web.OAHtmlElement
      • com.viaoa.web.OAServletImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJspComponent, OAJspRequirementsInterface, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAServletBackgroundImage

    public class OAServletImage
extends OAHtmlElement
    Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use an image using the ImageSerlvet Example: if image is in object Employee.ImageStore.bytes OAImage(hubEmployee, Employee.P_EmpImageStore); this will change the <img src=".."> to use the "/servlet/img" url Note: to make responsive, set the max-height: 100%
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRenderHtml

        public String getRenderHtml(com.viaoa.object.OAObject obj)
        Description copied from interface: OAJspComponent
        Called by containers to get html to render a view only version. This is used to display the non-activeObjects, instead of using the actual editor component.
